name: casino-app
description: Casino application with backend and frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run start:fast --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:slow: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run server
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run server
